body.name: Neutrogena Soothing & Calming Healthy Scalp Conditioner to Moisturize Dry Scalp & Hair, with Tea Tree Oil, pH-Balanced, Paraben-Free & Phthalate-Free, Safe for Color-Treated Hair, 12 fl oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 22 hrs 40 mins
features: Sooth and Moisturize hair from root to tip with Neutrogena Healthy Scalp Soothe and Calm Conditioner
Ideal for Dry, Uncomfortable Scalp and Hair: Our soothing conditioner helps calm dry scalp and cleanse strands
Formulated with Tea Tree Oil: A natural conditioning agent that helps refresh and revive the scalp
Gentle, Non Medicated Conditioner: Free from parabens, phthalates, sulfated surfactants, SLS and SLES
Helps Maintain Scalp's Natural Barrier: This nourishing pH balanced conditioner helps maintain scalp's natural barrier with regular use
body.description: Soothe & moisturize hair from root to tip with our calming scalp conditioner with tea tree oil. It helps reduce feelings of discomfort while also refreshing & reviving sensitive scalp. Ideal for dry, uncomfortable scalp and hair, it's suitable for all hair types including straight, wavy and curly hair.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #6,964 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #168 in Hair Conditioner

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Neutrogena Soothing & Calming Healthy Scalp Conditioner with Tea Tree Oil Calm dry scalp and hydrate for beautiful strands. This soothing conditioner, infused with tea tree oil, helps to moisturize hair as it calms and works to revive dry, sensitive scalp. Tea tree oil is a natural conditioning agent that helps to refresh hair and reduce feelings of discomfort, while also providing hydration for dry scalp and hair. This pH-balanced, clinically-proven scalp care system helps maintain scalp’s natural barrier with regular use – resulting in a soothed, healthy scalp & beautifully moisturized hair.

Gentle non-medicated conditioner is free from parabens, phthalates, sulfated surfactants, SLS & SLES Formulated with tea tree oil to calm & revive Suitable for all hair types and safe for use on color-treated hair to soothe, calm and moisturize

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars love this conditioner!
reviews.reviewText: I have been bleaching and dying my hair for a very long time! Finally, I stopped and I am trying to get my natural hair back. I bought this conditioner both for my scalp and my hair. it is amazing! My hair has been super soft and smells great. My friends told me that my hair had not looked this healthy in a while. Do keep in mind that I chopped a lot of my dead hair. But this conditioner has been taking good care of my hair. I let my hair air dry and it looks super nice, no frizz. One thing I will recommend is to not put too much on the scalp. After I did that I would have to shower again sooner maybe because of the residue of the product on my scalp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Shampoo!
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo smells so fresh and clean and makes my hair feel amazing. My favorite affordable shampoo, by far! Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Tranquil Retreat for Your Hair and Scalp
reviews.reviewText: The Neutrogena Soothing & Calming Healthy Scalp Conditioner has become a cherished addition to my hair care routine, providing a refreshing and soothing experience for both my hair and scalp. This conditioner has truly impressed me with its ability to deliver on its promises.The calming properties of this conditioner are immediately noticeable. The moment it touches my scalp, I feel a subtle, cooling sensation that is incredibly relaxing. It's like a mini spa treatment for my hair care routine. The formula is gentle, making it suitable for daily use, and it never fails to leave my scalp feeling refreshed.The scent is both subtle and invigorating. It's not overpowering, yet it adds a touch of freshness that lingers throughout the day. I appreciate that the fragrance is not only pleasant but also contributes to the overall calming effect.Beyond its sensory appeal, the Neutrogena Soothing & Calming Healthy Scalp Conditioner works wonders on my hair. It leaves my locks feeling soft, smooth, and easily manageable. I've noticed a reduction in frizz and an improvement in the overall texture of my hair since incorporating this conditioner into my routine.The conditioner doesn't weigh down my hair, and it rinses out effortlessly, leaving no residue behind. This is particularly important for me as someone with fine hair who often struggles with finding the right balance in hair care products.As with other Neutrogena products, I appreciate the brand's commitment to skin and hair health. The dermatologist-tested formula gives me confidence in the product's safety and effectiveness.In conclusion, the Neutrogena Soothing & Calming Healthy Scalp Conditioner is a gem in the world of hair care. It goes beyond the typical conditioner by delivering a spa-like experience for the scalp while leaving hair soft and manageable. If you're in search of a conditioner that pampers both your hair and scalp, this product is a fantastic choice. I highly recommend it for anyone looking to elevate their hair care routine with a touch of tranquility. My only issue is the price per bottle which may be a little on the higher end.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally relief for itchy scalp!
reviews.reviewText: And it only took one application for it to work it's magic! my scalp has not itched since using it. I was not using conditioner before because I never liked the way conditioner made my hair feel. This does NOT make my hair oily!! It feels clean and soft and for a guy at 68 years old getting his hair to feel that way again is amazing!! It always felt so brittle. Not anymore. Really impressed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Effective medicated hair conditioner
reviews.reviewText: Seems to help with dry hair. It does rinse out fairly completely it you are not careful. I do not like the smell of these products

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it ❤️
reviews.reviewText: I love this product so much. The smell is awesome. It makes your scalp tingle and leaves your hair feeling clean. I use both shampoo and conditioner. Definitely a repeat purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dry scalp relief
reviews.reviewText: This is really helping my dry scalp. The combination of really hot water and really dry air was drying out my hair and scalp. This is good as a regular conditioner and as a fingertip rub onto scalp conditioner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sooths your scalp
reviews.reviewText: I enjoy the product on my scalp I will keep buying it!!
